entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
